name: Athocast: Dreamer
description: This game was built in one month (March 2022) as part of the Winnipeg Slow Jam. It currently has very little content, but I hope to refine it further and add much more to it over time. My goal for the jam was to build something that could serve as the foundation for a larger game - so this current version just serves as a small test of the main gameplay mechanics.
